name: oci_field_precision
purpose: Tell the precision of a field

return.description: Returns the precision as an integer, or FALSE on errors.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocicolumnprecision instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_field_precision for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
